explains: adv. 特意，专门地；明确地，具体地；具体来说，确切地说；局限性地；专门；（生）种的

sentences.en: I specifically asked for this steak rare.
sentences.cn: 我明确要求了要把这份牛排做成半熟的。

sentences.en: We haven't specifically targeted school children.
sentences.cn: 我们没有专门针对学校的孩子。

sentences.en: I specifically told you not to go near the water!
sentences.cn: 我明确告诉过你不要靠近水边！
